infoPlist.NSCalendarsFullAccessUsageDescription: $(PRODUCT_NAME) needs access to your Calendar to schedule automatic reminders for bill due dates and payment tracking.

infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: $(PRODUCT_NAME) uses Face ID to securely unlock the app and authorize quick access to your shared bill data.
